titleStmt.title: A dialogue, concerning the strife of our churche wherein are aunswered diuers of those vniust accusations, wherewith the godly preachers and professors of the Gospell, are falsly charged; with a briefe declaration of some such monstrous abuses, as our byshops haue not bene ashamed to foster.

A dialogue, concerning the strife of our churche wherein are aunswered diuers of those vniust accusations, wherewith the godly preachers and professors of the Gospell, are falsly charged; with a briefe declaration of some such monstrous abuses, as our byshops haue not bene ashamed to foster.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark.
Quire K is in two settings; K3r has catchword (1) "God" or (2) "God?".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
